burning questionsWatch
and learn

A free online weekly video series for creatives of all creeds who’ve lost their spark and are searching for soulfire.

If you have a Burning Question that you’d like answered, please send it on over to us at james@jamesvictore.com (Please keep it short and sweet!)

Fan mail

Garrett H., TX

“ Who needs church when your weekly inspirations come right to my mailbox? Your efforts are making big beautiful differences in the lives of many. I love being a part of it and passing it on to the pockets of community I have here.” Anne E.

If you’re in Brighton, UK at any point, let me buy you a drink!” Jem P., UK
